title: DreamRobot Transformation
description: transforms DreamRObot Adapter Data to Standard OIH DataModels

transformCustomerToOih.title: Transform a customer to OIH
transformCustomerToOih.description: Transform the incoming data (from DR Adapter) to OIH-Person-model

transformOrderToOih.title: Transform an order to OIH
transformOrderToOih.description: Transform the incoming data (from DR Adapter) to OIH-Order-model

transformOihToOrder.title: Transform an order from OIH to DR
transformOihToOrder.description: Transform the outgoing data from OIH-Order-model to DR Adapter
